name: Fancy Crescents
author: Carol
summary: These are rich little things that melt in your mouth.
directions: Combine flour and butter in large bowl
Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly
In a separate bowl beat egg yolk and sour cream together with spoon
Chill covered in refrigerator at least 4 hours
If you make this in the evening, store overnight
Stir sugar and cinnamon together to use instead of flour for rolling dough
Roll about 1/4-1/3 of dough into circle about 10 inches in diameter, sprinkling with sugar-cinnamon mixture on both sides as needed both to roll and for taste
Beginning at outer wide edge, roll toward center
Arrange on ungreased baking sheet close together, not touching
Bake in a preheated  375 degrees F (190 degrees C) oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until browned
